settings.title: Our CEO
settings.content: Our CEO's vision is to pioneer innovative audio products that combine exceptional aesthetic design and superior audio performance, catering to music enthusiasts worldwide.

At Divoom, we embody a unique blend of values: 9% love, 17% beauty, 13% fashion, 5% madness, 17% power, 8% goal in the last minute, 6% adrenaline, and 25% heart and soul service. Inspired by our deep love for music and a passion for high-quality audio, we meticulously fine-tune our speakers to achieve acoustic perfection, tailored for every music enthusiast's delight.

settings.title: Our Journey
settings.content:
Established in 2006 by a team of dedicated music enthusiasts, Divoom has introduced numerous iconic portable speakers over the past 14 years.

Our journey towards innovation reached new heights when, in 2014, Terry encountered fascinating LED gadgets at the San Francisco Maker's Faire.

These gadgets, which integrated SD card-loaded 8-bit pixel designs with LEDs, inspired us to pioneer the world's first pixel art speaker - the Aurabox - in 2015, achieving tremendous success.

Since then, we have expanded our product line to include several non-speaker pixel art gadgets, such as the Pixoo sling bag.

settings.title: Our Motto
settings.content: There is no limitation for Divoom designers to realize their dream and union of true product design

settings.title: Find Us & Spark Your Life
settings.content: From Paris' Charles de Gaulle Airport to New York's Museum of Modern Art, Dubai's Twin Towers Shopping Centre, and Akihabara's Anime Shop, Divoom products are available in over 50 countries. With more than 15 million products sold globally, we deeply value customer experience and product excellence, regardless of scale. Join us in exploring the vibrant world of pixel art and experience the transformative power of light and sound with Divoom.
